alert.note: Alert for Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 7:28PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN MADISON...SOUTHERN COOK...LOWNDES...BROOKS AND SOUTHEASTERN COLQUITT COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 727 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Sparks to 8 miles west of Hahira to 6 miles southwest of I-75 At Exit 16 to 6 miles north of Blue Springs. Movement was southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Madison, Lake Park, Adel, Valdosta, Quitman, Moultrie, Hahira, Sparks, Pavo, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Dasher, Morven, Berlin, Barwick, Cecil, Ellenton, Reed Bingham State Park, and Grooverville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
